explains: n. 皮肤科医生；皮肤学者

sentences.en: One was Arnold Klein, his Beverly Hills dermatologist.
sentences.cn: 其中就有埃诺德·克莱因，他住在贝佛莉山庄时的皮肤病医生。

sentences.en: If you find a sudden bald spot, see your dermatologist.
sentences.cn: 如果发现突然性的秃发，请去找皮肤科医生。

sentences.en: If you notice any changes in your skin, such as growths or bleeding, consult a dermatologist right away.
sentences.cn: 如果发现你皮肤上有任何变化，如肿瘤或流血，要马上看皮肤科医生。
